subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: One of the [[Wikipedia:Chinese characters of Empress Wu|Chinese characters created by Empress Wu]] to demonstrate her power. She was said to have disliked how the traditional form contained 或, which she interpreted as meaning "mislead" (see [[惑]]). In this form, this character consists of [[四]] (four, also acting as the [[Index:Chinese radical/囗|囗]] enclosure) and 方 (direction).
